item.title: Simple demo about the class of CAEmitterLayer
item.description: The CAEmitterLayer class provides a particle emitter system for Core Animation. The particles are defined by instances of CAEmitterCell. You should get some information about CAEmitterLayer from Apple Document before we start it. This class is inherits from CALayer, so we do not import any frameworks when we use it. We will use some properties in this demo like this list: CAEmitterLayer emitterPosition - The position of the center of the particle emitter.
